title: card.location.mode Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Sets location-related configuration settings. Retrieves the current location mode when passed with no argument.

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

mode.description: Must be one of: empty string to retrieve the current mode, 'off' to turn location mode off, 'periodic' to sample location at a specified interval, 'continuous' to enable the Notecard's GPS/GNSS module for continuous sampling, or 'fixed' to report the location as a fixed location

seconds.description: When in periodic mode, location will be sampled at this interval, if the Notecard detects motion

vseconds.description: In periodic mode, overrides seconds with a voltage-variable value

lat.description: Used with fixed mode to specify the latitude coordinate

lon.description: Used with fixed mode to specify the longitude coordinate

max.description: Maximum number of seconds to wait for a GPS fix
